featured.text: Researchers further point out that in most people synesthesia is active only during the first months of their infancy, while this ability remains forever in certain individuals.
Younger children tend to remain forever “the baby,” enjoyable to be around, but at times overdependent on others.
However, all of this mail cannot simply be stored forever; there is just too much of it.

definition.en_def: For all future time; for always.
